name: Stickman Race Draw
description:
Destroy the enemy and perform steep stunts on different wheelbarrows killing games.
Get to the finish line alive or dead, win the fight with the strongest!

_________________________________________________________________
RAN FROM THE PLACE
At your disposal are many machines,dismount,road draw, road line, manage them in the role of a stickman dismount. Jump on the trampolines, do steep stunts and jump over enemy. The brakes were invented by cowards! Press the gas to the stop and destroy all to win. Choose your car for destruction and race.
Slam into the enemies at high speed. line rider race draw. Earn points and spend cars.

_________________________________________________________________
DESTRUCTION LEGEND!
You are not subject to the laws of physics? Break them by driving steep wheelbarrows and performing enchanting tricks.
Check your reaction and strength in the fight for the title of the best stickman dismount.
